Issue.creator: dulcep
Issue.summary: As a user, I would like to use the same EnrollmentID in more than one device
Issue.description: Story: It is common for users to work from multiple devices and to expect seamless operation/interaction when transitioning from one device to another. For example, as a user on a business trip I would like to use the same EnrollmentID on my mobile phone/tablet/etc that I use in my laptop.
